data.eml:eml: Additional record of Rayllianassa amboinensis (de Man, 1888) from Japan, and description of a new species from Okinawa Island, Ryukyu Islands (Crustacea: Decapoda: Axiidea: Callianassidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Fujita, Yoshihisa, Maenosono, Tadafumi (2014): Additional record of Rayllianassa amboinensis (de Man, 1888) from Japan, and description of a new species from Okinawa Island, Ryukyu Islands (Crustacea: Decapoda: Axiidea: Callianassidae). Zootaxa 3835 (4): 549-563, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3835.4.6
